item.title: 3 New Tools I Picked Up and What I Like Most About Them
item.description: As a strong believer in the idea that a new job means new habits, I’m always looking for ways to improve my workflow and boost productivity. In this post, I’ll be sharing 3 new tools that I’ve started using and highlighting the features that I like most. So, if you’re looking for some new tools to add to your developer toolkit, read on! Wrap Wrap a next-level terminal, developed in Rust.
